query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing campaigns use basic segmentation (demographics, past bookings) without predicting future customer value or churn risk. This results in inefficient ad spend—treating high-risk churners the same as loyal customers, and missing upsell opportunities with high-value prospects. Unable to proactively retain at-risk customers or personalize offers based on predicted lifetime value.',
  aiApproach = 'Build machine learning model (using Python/scikit-learn or AWS SageMaker) that predicts customer lifetime value (CLV) and churn probability based on booking history, engagement patterns, demographics, and seasonal trends. Model outputs feed into Salesforce for automated segmentation and personalized campaign triggers. Requires data pipeline setup, feature engineering, and ongoing model monitoring.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Reactive retention: Wait for customer to churn → send generic win-back offer (20% success rate). Broadcast promotions to all segments equally.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'Predictive retention: ML model identifies high-churn-risk customers 30 days before expected churn → trigger personalized retention offer based on predicted CLV → proactive outreach. Target high-CLV prospects with premium packages.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates reactive retention approach, enables proactive churn prevention, optimizes marketing spend by focusing on high-value customers',
  processOwner = 'Director of Marketing Analytics',
  affectedTeams = '["Marketing Analytics", "CRM Team", "Retention Marketing", "Data Engineering"]',
  primaryMetric = 'revenue_increase',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Increase customer retention by 15% and improve marketing ROI by 25% through targeted campaigns',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 68% annual retention rate, $450 average CLV, 3.2:1 marketing ROI',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 78% retention rate, increase high-value customer segment by 20%, improve marketing ROI to 4:1',
  measurementMethod = 'Monthly cohort analysis, CLV tracking in Salesforce, marketing attribution modeling'
WHERE title = 'Predictive Customer Lifetime Value Model';
